mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BENEFICIART( BENEFICIART_CD, BENEFICIART_NM, BENEFICIART_COMMENT, CONTRIBUTION, BENEFICIART_BIRTH, BENEFICIART_SEX, BENEFICIART_HOBBY, BENEFICIART_FAMILY, BENEFICIART_COUNTRY, BENEFICIART_FILE_NAME ) VALUES ( #{beneficiartCd}, #{beneficiartNm}, #{beneficiartComment}, #{contribution}, #{beneficiartBirth}, #{beneficiartSex}, #{beneficiartHobby}, #{beneficiartFamily}, #{beneficiartCountry}, #{beneficiartFileName} )
